title: Heartbreakers
description: AVAILABLE NOW!Hearts were made to be broken. . .Tess is a heartbreaker, and she knows it. She doesn’t let anyone into her heart or her pants, but she doesn’t mind flirting and stringing guys along. She may have finally met her match in her best friend’s stepbrother, Blake, who’s visiting for the summer. Blake is a player, accustomed to getting whatever he wants, but something about Tess intrigues him. For the first time in years, he might want something more than sex.She doesn’t trust him and doesn’t have plans to. But when their chemistry is too strong to deny, both of them will have to change everything they thought about sex, relationships, and that pesky four-letter word, love.
author: Samantha Grey
